title: Pon Ondru Kanden Lyrics Padithal Mattum Podhuma
stanzas: <div>Pon Ondru Kanden Lyrics Padithal Mattum Podhuma

pon ondru kanden

poo ondru kanden
mugam kaanavillai
yaen endru naan sollaaguma
yaen endru naan solla venduma

thuvandu vizhum kodi idaiyal
thuvandu vizhum kodi idaiyal

pen angu illai

enendru naan solla venduma

envizhiyil nee irundhaai

un vadivil naan irundhen
